long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download Amazon product images and videos easily with this popular tool!
Click once to save Amazon images in high quality directly to your computer. Simple and efficient!

⭐ **Getting Started:**

🚀 Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension.
🛍️ Open your target Amazon product page.
📸 Click on the Amazon Image Downloader icon to open it.
📥 Download product images by variants, main, and description.
📊 Export images and video details to Excel.

⭐ **Features:**

🗂️ Download Variant Images (ZIP format)
📑 Export Variant Details (Excel format, XLSX)
🖱️ One-Click Download All Images (ZIP format)
📊 One-Click Export All Details (Excel format, XLSX)
🎥 One-Click Download Videos (MP4 format)

❓ **Is it free?**
Yes, Amazon Image Downloader is free to use.

❓ **Why Choose Amazon Image Downloader?**

⚡ Fast and easy way to download Amazon product images and videos.
📝 Export product information including titles, SKUs, variants, and URLs directly to Excel.
📈 Perfect for sellers, researchers, and anyone needing to save product details from Amazon.

📬 **Contact Us:**
Please do not hesitate to contact us with any questions at 📧 webstarue@gmail.com.
